artist: Designer: Charles Catteau; Manufacturer: Boch Freres Keramis, La Louviere, Belgium
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
image_copyright: Copyright of the artist, artist's estate, or assignees
text: Catteau made ceramics modern with simplified, flattened decoration based on nature, often in vivid colors.  Violet, aqua, and red flowers trail from the top of this massive floor vase. The intentionally cracked surface on the glaze of this large vase is called craquelure.
title: Monumental vase
